headline: Tell HN: Mega says 10MB/s is an ‶acceptable speed″ for a $100/yr premium account
description:
I'm a paid user of MEGA (mega.nz) and I've had a very bad surprise recently when trying to download my data. The MEGASync desktop app consistently oscillates around 10-15MB/s.

I contacted MEGA's support and I had a very long and painful email thread where they provided me with unhelpful solutions such as:

– Set the “Download rate limit” to “No limit”

– For added security, improved loading times and handling of large files, you should install our browser extension

– Try to perform the transfer during a non-peak time, you should notice an increase of the transfer speed rate

They asked me several times to run speed tests, which consistently showed that my connection reached 1 Gbps. They also asked me dozens and dozens of unhelpful things to check.

After countless back-and-forths, they eventually escalated the issue to their engineers. They then told me that their ‶team has tried to fix the issue on [their] end″. No speed difference of course.

They then just gave up and said that a 10MB/s download speed for a premium $100/yr premium account is ‶acceptable″ and ‶within standard parameters″ (whatever that means). Their direct competitor 1fichier provides a 10× faster download speed that maximizes my connection at 100+ MB/s for only around 1/5 of the price. Big oops.

Stay away from this terrible provider. On their website they claim ‶super fast transfer speeds″ and ‶pay less for better performance″. This is just a plain lie. What other claims are bullshit? Their claim that they are ‶reliable″ and have ‶redundant server infrastructure″?
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：Mega说10MB/s是一个100美元/年的高级账户可以接受的速度。
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：Mega說10MB/s是一個100美元/年的高級賬戶可以接受的速度。
description_zh-Hans:
我是MEGA（mega.nz）的付费用户，最近在试图下载我的数据时，我遇到了一个非常糟糕的意外。MEGASync的桌面应用程序始终在10-15MB/s左右震荡。

我联系了MEGA的支持，我经历了一个非常漫长和痛苦的电子邮件，他们向我提供了无助的解决方案，例如：

- 将 "下载速率限制 "设置为 "无限制"

- 为了增加安全性，改善加载时间和处理大文件，你应该安装我们的浏览器扩展

- 尝试在非高峰期进行传输，你应该注意到传输速度的增加

他们要求我多次进行速度测试，结果一直显示我的连接达到1Gbps。他们还问了我几十种无益的东西来检查。

经过无数次的反反复复，他们最终将问题升级到他们的工程师。然后他们告诉我，他们的‶团队已经尝试在[他们的]一端修复了这个问题″。

然后他们就放弃了，说100美元/年的高级账户，10MB/s的下载速度是可以接受的″，而且是在标准参数之内″（不管那是什么意思）。他们的直接竞争对手1fichier提供了10倍的下载速度，使我的连接速度达到了100多MB/s，而价格却只有1/5左右。大错特错。

远离这个糟糕的供应商。在他们的网站上，他们声称‶超快的传输速度″和‶支付更少的钱获得更好的性能″。这只是一个简单的谎言。还有哪些说法是胡说八道？他们声称自己是‶可靠的，并且有‶冗余的服务器基础设施"？
